segments.advisor_message: So, uh, just to wrap things up, can you tell me your full name, like, you know, the first and last, and, um, if there's any middle names maybe?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, sure. It’s, um, it’s Kyle, Kyle Johnson, and I don’t, uh, I don’t have any middle names so just, just Kyle, yeah.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Kyle! And, um, what about your title? Like, Mr., or anything, and your date of birth?
segments.client_message: Uh, just Mr. for the title, I guess. And my birthday’s 15-08-1990, yeah.

segments.advisor_message: Perfect! And, uh, where, where were you born, if you don’t mind me asking?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I was, uh, born in Denver, it’s, um, in Colorado.
